sen.j: 平 清経（たいら の きよつね、長寛元年（1163年） - 寿永2年3月10日 (旧暦)（1183年4月4日））は、平重盛の三男。
sen.e: TAIRA no Kiyotsune (1163 - April 11, 1183) was the third son of TAIRA no Shigemori.

sen.e: He was dislodged from Dazai-fu (local government office in Kyushu region) by his former retainer Koreyoshi OGATA, and it led him to throw himself into the sea at Yanagi ga ura Bay in Buzen Province to his death.

sen.e: In the section of 'Rokudo no sata' (matters of six posthumous worlds) in "The tale of the Heike [the Taira family]," Kenreimonin tells that Kiyotsune's death was 'the beginning of depressing events' for the Taira family.

sen.j: 清経が入水したのは現在の大分県宇佐市柳ヶ浦地区・駅館川沖合といわれている。
sen.e: It is said that today the point where Kiyotsune threw himself into the sea is off the Yakkan-gawa River in Yanagi ga ura district, Usa City, Oita Prefecture.
